definition: to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale

sentences.english: So they moved the ark of the God of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 於是將以色列神的約櫃運到那裏去。

sentences.english: Then they carried the ark into Dagon's temple and set it beside Dagon.
sentences.chinese: 非利士人將神的約櫃擡進大袞廟，放在大袞的旁邊。

sentences.english: The high priest Eli was terribly distressed to see the Ark of Covenant taken from the Holy of Holies.
sentences.chinese: 以利王哀傷的看着神的約櫃被搬出神殿。

sentences.english: Among the most sought-after of these religious antiquities is the famed Ark of the Covenant.
sentences.chinese: 在這些最受人追捧的宗教古董中就有著名的約櫃。

sentences.english: After the Philistines had captured the ark of God, they took it from Ebenezer to Ashdod.
sentences.chinese: 非利士人將神的約櫃從以便以謝擡到亞實突。

sentences.english: Therefore they sent the ark of God to Ekron.
sentences.chinese: 他們就把神的約櫃送到以革倫。

sentences.english: What was the turning point for Israelites to turn from defeat to victory in the Ark lost event?
sentences.chinese: 約櫃被擄事件以色列轉敗爲勝的關鍵何在？

sentences.english: Now the ark of the Lord was in the country of the Philistines for seven months.
sentences.chinese: 上主的約櫃在培肋舍特地方七個月之久。

sentences.english: All the responsible men of Israel came, and the Levites took up the ark.
sentences.chinese: 以色列衆長老來到，利未人便擡起約櫃。

sentences.english: For their wings were outstretched over the place where the ark was, covering the ark and its rods.
sentences.chinese: 基路伯張著翅膀在約櫃之上，遮掩約櫃和擡櫃的槓。

sentences.english: For their wings were outstretched over the place where the ark was, covering the ark and its rods.
sentences.chinese: 基路伯張著翅膀在約櫃之上，遮掩約櫃和擡櫃的槓。

sentences.english: Afher discussing the matter, they decided to move the Ark to the city of Gath.
sentences.chinese: 經過討論後，他們決定將以色列的約櫃搬到迦特去。

sentences.english: And all the elders of Israel came, and the Levites took up the ark.
sentences.chinese: 以色列衆長老來到，利未人便擡起約櫃。

sentences.english: When all the elders of Israel had arrived, the Levites took up the ark
sentences.chinese: 以色列衆長老來到，利未人便擡起約櫃。

sentences.english: And these are they whom David set over the service of song in the house of the LORD， after that the ark had rest.
sentences.chinese: 約櫃安設之後，大衛派人在耶和華殿中管理歌唱的事。

sentences.english: And Eli's two sons, Hophni and Phinehas, were there with the ark of the covenant of God.
sentences.chinese: 以利的兩個兒子何弗尼，非尼哈與神的約櫃同來。

definition: El Niño (meteorology)/Holy Infant (cf biblical nativity story)
